English: Mirianne welcomes you. Continue your journey with 3 Star Mirianne!\n(If you already own the Hero, you will obtain 200 Unique Weapon Fragments instead.)

T6 Legendary Swift Darkness Gear Ticket

You can obtain a T6 Legendary Swift Darkness Gear Box by selecting one of the following Hero types: Tank/Dealer/Support.\nThe T6 Legendary Swift Darkness Gear Box contains 4 types of T6 Legendary Swift Darkness Gear with optimal options for the selected type of Heroes.
Use EXP Potion to level up your heroes.
Equip Runes on your gear to make it more powerful.
You can use Magic Powder to enhance the options of your gear and upgrade their tiers.

Selene welcomes you. Continue your journey with 5 Star Selene!\n(If you already own the Hero, you will obtain 250 Unique Weapon Fragments instead.)
This is Selene's Unique Weapon, Green Winds, Notos.\nEquip your Heroes with Unique Weapons and Unique Treasures to make them stronger and stylish!
